answers.answer: As a diabetic, it is very important that you see an ophthalmologist regularly, at least once a year, to be sure that the diabetes is not affecting the health of your eyes.  Please consult an ophthalmologist for a complete exam, including a dilated exam of the retina.

question: Sir i have dibaties and now i am filling eye problame can plz say which medicen i take
title: for my eye
